description:
Welcome to this course, Metaphysical Bible Study: Decoding the Revelation, Part One (Revelation 1:1 to 8:1).

This study of Revelation is a consciousness-journey where you will learn to decode the apocalyptic symbols and apply spiritual truths, ideas, and laws to your life that bring healing and immense spiritual development.

If you are a spiritual seeker curious about the book of Revelation, looking for powerful spiritual development with practical effects, this course is for you. Part One of this course includes the riveting story of Revelation's origin, the experiences of its author, and a life-changing, health-producing analysis of the "Messages to the Churches," messages to the individual consciousness that skyrocket spiritual development and understanding. It continues to the 2nd of the seven Visions that make up the body of Revelation (the "Throne-Room" and the "Angels with Seals"). The following course, "Decoding the Revelation: Part 2," completes this dynamic and energizing study with the final Visions. Expected launch date, October 2015.

Students should work through this course (Part One) in about six to eight weeks, and the subsequent course on the seven visions of Revelation in three to four months. Steady, systematic study will yield the best results as you train thought to live consistently and consciously in the healing-energy of the Christ.

Recommendation: Study deeply and meditate on the key ideas. Utilize the decoded instructions for overcoming whatever is unlike good and claiming your true freedom in the Love of the One, the I AM THAT I AM. Review each day, keep a journal, and feel after the vibrant energy of Spirit in everyday life.

Let the Spirit shine through. â€œDraw nigh to God, and He will draw nigh to you" (James 4:8).
title: Metaphysical Bible Study: Decoding the Revelation, Part One
